_.componentleveltooltip: Unit count||An army can have up to a maximum of 20 units, including any embedded [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (cco_pair = FactionContext.RitualManagerContext().RemainingEffectBundleTurnsOfLastCompletedRitualFromCategory("CARESS_OF_SLAANESH_RITUAL", MilitaryForceContext)) => CcoRTLastRitual( Ritual : cco_pair.First, RemainingTurns : cco_pair.Second)

FactionContext.IsEnemy == false && FactionContext.IsPlayersFaction == false && MilitaryForceContext.IsFixedCamp == false && FactionContext.IsHuman == false && IsLocalPlayersTurn && IsContextValid(CaravanContext) == false

localised_text.tooltip_text: Merge selected units||Merge the units you have selected, combining their remaining force into one unit - any remaining troops will remain with their own unit once it hits its maximum manpower level.
Select units on the Augment panel
Upgrade||Upgrading this unit will provide its soldiers with better equipment as well as any training bonuses that they can learn from buildings in this province. This will improve the units stats.
Loan army||Become military allies and earn favour points to unlock the ability to loan armies

default.name: default
default.tooltip: Trollkind||The number of Trollkind earned by this army per turn.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Trollkind contribution is suspended while "Call the Monstrous Horde!" is active

global_available_entry.componentleveltooltip: Allied recruitment capacity||Each additional slot allows an extra unit to be recruited concurrently. Allied recruitment slots are shared between all armies under your command.
Global recruitment capacity||Each additional slot allows an extra unit to be recruited concurrently. Global recruitment slots are shared between all armies under your command.

global_capacity_other_entry.componentleveltooltip: This recruitment slot is being used by another army.||Left-click to zoom to army.
This recruitment slot is being used by another army.||Left-click to zoom to army.

icon_allegiace.componentleveltooltip: Passive income: [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]{{CcoCampaignFactionInteraction:FavourPointsChangePerTurn}}||Allegiance indicates how much support this ally is willing to give you against your shared enemies. It slowly increases over time and can be increased by completing missions.

icon_at_sea.componentleveltooltip: At Sea||This army is currently at sea, using a fleet of transport ships.

icon_loan.componentleveltooltip: Turns until army is returned to {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:FactionLoanedFromContext.Name}}

icon_plagues_available_daemon_prince.comment: Ian wanted to highlight plagues functionality first time it was available playing as daemon prince

available.name: available
available.tooltip: Local recruitment capacity||Each additional slot allows an extra unit to be recruited concurrently. Local recruitment capacity can be increased with buildings, technologies and skills.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (target_height = self.ChildContext("list_box").Dimensions.y, height_cap = GetIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.y < 1079, 490, 562), final_height = MinNumericValue(target_height, height_cap)) => { DoIf(final_height != 1, Do(self.Resize(self.Dimensions.x, final_height, true), self.ScrollToValue(9999, true))) }
